<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ConcurrentHashTable - is a resizeable concurrent hashtable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The number of resizings limited up to x2^31. This hashtable is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// useful to have efficient access to aggregate data(like strings,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// type descriptors...) and to keep only single copy of such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// an aggregate. The hashtable allows only concurrent insertions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// KeyDataTy&#42; = insert ( const KeyTy&amp; );</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Data structure:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Inserted value KeyTy is mapped to 64-bit hash value -&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///          &#91;------- 64-bit Hash value --------&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///          &#91;  StartEntryIndex &#93;&#91; Bucket Index &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                    |                |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///              points to the     points to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///              first probe       the bucket.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///              position inside</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///              bucket entries</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// After initialization, all buckets have an initial size. During insertions,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// buckets might be extended to contain more entries. Each bucket can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// independently resized and rehashed(no need to lock the whole table).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Different buckets may have different sizes. If the single bucket is full</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// then the bucket is resized.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BucketsArray keeps all buckets. Each bucket keeps an array of Entries</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (pointers to KeyDataTy) and another array of entries hashes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BucketsArray&#91;BucketIdx&#93;.Hashes&#91;EntryIdx&#93;:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BucketsArray&#91;BucketIdx&#93;.Entries&#91;EntryIdx&#93;:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#91;Bucket 0&#93;.Hashes -&gt; &#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;&#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#91;Bucket 0&#93;.Entries -&gt; &#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;&#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#91;Bucket 1&#93;.Hashes -&gt; &#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;&#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;&#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;&#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#91;Bucket 1&#93;.Entries -&gt; &#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;&#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;&#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;&#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                      .........................</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#91;Bucket N&#93;.Hashes -&gt; &#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;&#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;&#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#91;Bucket N&#93;.Entries -&gt; &#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;&#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;&#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ConcurrentHashTableByPtr uses an external thread-safe allocator to allocate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// KeyDataTy items.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ThreadsNum &gt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EstimatedNumberOfBuckets &#42;= InitialNumberOfBuckets;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EstimatedNumberOfBuckets &#42;= std::max(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">          1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">countr&#95;zero</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5542d44947f8d964b5ce3b20ea719b44">PowerOf2Ceil</a>(EstimatedSize / InitialNumberOfBuckets)) &gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">              2);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Insert new value \\p NewValue or return already existing entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns entry and &quot;true&quot; if an entry is just inserted or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &quot;false&quot; if an entry already exists.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a05f04083a96d1718f46e8f875425e636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;KeyDataTy &#42;, bool&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a05f04083a96d1718f46e8f875425e636">insert</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KeyTy &amp;NewValue) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate bucket index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Hash = Info::getHashValue(NewValue);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket">Bucket</a> &amp;CurBucket = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a45da1a667c220a2ac0fedb7909854fdd">BucketsArray</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a857ab9b7da763acc25c658249b28392b">getBucketIdx</a>(Hash)&#93;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurEntryHashBits == 0 &amp;&amp; BucketEntries&#91;CurEntryIdx&#93; == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Found empty slot. Insert data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">        KeyDataTy &#42;NewData = Info::create(NewValue, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#af35139c2a8f5bac9ccaa8fbdf71f575b">MultiThreadAllocator</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BucketEntries&#91;CurEntryIdx&#93; = NewData;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BucketHashes&#91;CurEntryIdx&#93; = ExtHashBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#ab2b0b6cb8e9ed68ff3a3ab5e5ed90548">NumberOfEntries</a>++;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CurBucket.Guard.unlock();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;NewData, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurEntryHashBits == ExtHashBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hash matched. Check value for equality.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">        KeyDataTy &#42;EntryData = BucketEntries&#91;CurEntryIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Info::isEqual(Info::getKey(&#42;EntryData), NewValue)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Already existed entry matched with inserted data is found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">          CurBucket.Guard.unlock();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memset(DestHashes, 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#aa3e778be998a13fea1fddd7272d378c9">ExtHashBitsTy</a>) &#42; NewBucketSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a6aad12071c0bf07633da45ddffaacdb8">DataPtr</a> DestEntries = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">new</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a6894f2cdd05844b8809e7e2039210fb7">EntryDataTy</a>&#91;NewBucketSize&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memset(DestEntries, 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a6894f2cdd05844b8809e7e2039210fb7">EntryDataTy</a>) &#42; NewBucketSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each entry in source arrays...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint32&#95;t CurSrcEntryIdx = 0; CurSrcEntryIdx &lt; CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#aa615b1ffd20a1385b4fa159a306d2b5e">Size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">         CurSrcEntryIdx++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t CurSrcEntryHashBits = SrcHashes&#91;CurSrcEntryIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for null entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurSrcEntryHashBits == 0 &amp;&amp; SrcEntries&#91;CurSrcEntryIdx&#93; == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t StartDestIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a168883c86f9ce8b870444e70b6764735">getStartIdx</a>(CurSrcEntryHashBits, NewBucketSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert non-null entry into the new arrays.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint32&#95;t CurDestEntryHashBits = DestHashes&#91;StartDestIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurDestEntryHashBits == 0 &amp;&amp; DestEntries&#91;StartDestIdx&#93; == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Found empty slot. Insert data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">          DestHashes&#91;StartDestIdx&#93; = CurSrcEntryHashBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">          DestEntries&#91;StartDestIdx&#93; = SrcEntries&#91;CurSrcEntryIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">        StartDestIdx++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">        StartDestIdx = StartDestIdx &amp; (NewBucketSize - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update bucket fields.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#a7b75e8b63cf9b1849f0310f3d82acb28">Hashes</a> = DestHashes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#a49298c812045349a99ae5d9c1f66f887">Entries</a> = DestEntries;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#aa615b1ffd20a1385b4fa159a306d2b5e">Size</a> = NewBucketSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Delete old bucket entries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcHashes != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#91;&#93; SrcHashes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcEntries != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#91;&#93; SrcEntries;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a857ab9b7da763acc25c658249b28392b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a857ab9b7da763acc25c658249b28392b">getBucketIdx</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hash-code">hash&#95;code</a> Hash) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hash &amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a88cae2ee8b5852e292ba945d9bf202ce">HashMask</a>; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
